description: Steak tartare is made from finely chopped raw beef, mixed with seasonings like mustard, capers, shallots, and topped with a raw egg yolk.
Slow-cooked spare ribs, glazed in a smoky barbecue sauce, tender and falling off the bone.
Oven-baked salmon fillet seasoned with herbs and lemon, served with a side of vegetables.
Crispy hot fries served with a choice of dipping sauces.
Moist cornbread mixed with melted cheddar cheese, served hot.
Juicy grilled steak served with a side of mashed potatoes and grilled vegetables.
A 1kg Rib Eye steak grilled to perfection, served with a rich red wine jus.
A vegan-friendly, plant-based steak served hot with a side of grilled veggies.
Tender pulled pork slow-cooked in barbecue sauce, served on a toasted bun with coleslaw.
A generous serving of slow-smoked beef brisket, served with barbecue sauce and pickles.
Marinated chicken wings, grilled and basted in a smoky barbecue sauce, served with ranch dip.
Slow-cooked beans in a rich barbecue sauce, seasoned with smoked spices.
